thread.title: NASA: Scientists Discovered 7 New Earth-like Planets | News
thread.title_full: NASA: Scientists Discovered 7 New Earth-like Planets | News

author: Thomas Byrne
title: NASA: Scientists Discovered 7 New Earth-like Planets | News
text:
NASA has discovered new planets that could possibly sustain human life. 
FOX’s Eben Brown reports: 
Scientists have located seven planets orbiting the star known as TRAPPIST-1, and they’re all just the right size, and: 
(Zubuchen) “Three of these planets marked in green are in the Habitable Zone, where liquid water can pool on the surface. In fact, with the right atmospheric conditions there could be water on any of these planets.” 
NASA’s Thomas Zubuchen. What’s more is that one planet, the fifth in the system, probably has Earth-like temperatures. It’s all 40 light years distance, which while cosmically close, is more than 230 trillion miles away. 
Eben Brown, FOX News.
